description.value:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] are vestiges of a greater entity. This entity can communicate through them if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] touches the person the entity wants to talk to. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate telepathically in any language listed on this drone.


The malakai are mentally connected by either this entity or a local commander, such as Emrys or Lorkul. They know the location of all other malakai controlled by the same commander, and share all their senses.
